short_summary: Remediation of BAR-B Beach Refuelling Area, Stokes Point, Yukon
description: The Defense Construction Canada is calling for proposals for the remediation of BAR-B Beach Refuelling Area, Stokes Point, Yukon. Estimated cost is $6,788,048.00. Bids evaluated using established criteria in the Request for Abbreviated Proposals. The objective of this Request for Abbreviated Proposals is to select the Proponent with the highest total score.
full_summary:
### Remediation of BAR-B Beach Refuelling Area, Stokes Point, Yukon
### Overview
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) issues a Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RAP) for construction services to remediate the BAR-B Beach Refuelling Area, Stokes Point, Yukon.

### Tenders Details
- **Contract Reference:** PW-23-01024722
- **Tender Number:** PW-23-01024722-001 (2nd Amendment)
- **Publish Date:** February 3, 2023
- **Closing Date and Time:** March 28, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
- **Estimated Contract Value:** Approximately CAD $6,788,048.00

### Scope of Work
Remediation of the BAR-B Beach Refuelling Area, Stokes Point, Yukon, to bring it into constitutional compliance with existing regulations and guidelines.

### Evaluation and Selection
The proposal evaluation and selection will be based on established criteria and point system. The primary objective is to select the Proponent providing the best value for the services offered.

### Additional Information
- The contract term must be completed by November 30, 2023.
- Substantial completion must occur by August 30, 2023.
- No site visits will be organised during this solicitation.
- Proponents can submit their RAP through the MERX Electronic Bidding System.
- Proposers must be registered suppliers to bid.

### Posting Contractor
Defence Construction Canada
Constitution Square, 19th Floor, 350 Albert Street Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K3
keltie.leger@dcc-cdc.gc.ca (343) 542-5027
